snippet.title: False Vows, True Love -Otome-
snippet.description:
We added functions and re-released.
【GooglePlay】
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.favary.fvtl.pro
【AppStore】
https://itunes.apple.com/WebObjects/MZStore.woa/wa/viewSoftware?id=1364289565&mt=8



▼Game Outline
An original romance brought to you by the creators of Japanese hit otome games.
Available in French.

▼Synopsis
Unusual circumstances have driven you to pose as a young noble lady.
Men harboring ambition struggle for your heart and your body——
Is it a cruel scheme or a true love that awaits the false lady——?

▼Gameplay Instruction
Advancing is easy. Simply by tapping the screen, you advance the story, and can enjoy being the heroine of this romance.
By the choices you make during the story, you can obtain beautiful stills, and enjoy sweeter developments.

This game is free to download, and can be enjoyed at no charge.
However, an internet-connected smartphone device is necessary to play.

▼Recommended for these users
We recommend this game to the following people.
・People who enjoy "Otome games"
・People who enjoy love stories.
・People who want to enjoy a romance they can't encounter in daily life.
・People who like Japanese games, anime, or manga.
・People who are looking for a free game.
